title: (x) Please help: Popular serif font right...used on this month's Cosmo - Poster Bodoni {Igor F}
content:
Hey everyone-  
I know someone out there knows what font this is. The headline "Curb Your Cravings" on this month's Cosmo uses it (link attached to image).

I have some similar ones, but nothing quite as clean as this one. Thanks for the help!

[http://4.bp.blogspot.com/\_EGDH7a-Ga20/S3hWJ74GeAI/AAAAAAAAAIg/oPfFhoBoWaY/s1600-h/cosmo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100222000748/http:/4.bp.blogspot.com/_EGDH7a-Ga20/S3hWJ74GeAI/AAAAAAAAAIg/oPfFhoBoWaY/s1600-h/cosmo.png)
author: dzandman
